name: Interconscious-Simulator
description:
Interconscious-Simulator is a Chaos simulator.

In a nutshell this is a simulation Software experiment from 2017.

I am releasing old projects on my hard drive, that where never finished. Nonetheless I would like to share this experience with you. All my works has some hidden deeper meaning. It is up to you what value you can take from this. You can use this in for your home-Lockdown party to get through this though times. Also, if you like my work please feel free to support me for me to continue this journey.

Paypal: https://paypal.me/limbicnation?locale.x=en_US

Much love!

Gero                     

Too bad I did not include a screenshot capture button. Again, my source code got corrupted since the project is so old and I do not have the time to fix the issues ☹

Visuals: Gero Doll 

Sound: Olivier Girardot
